FrageText.de: Was haben Sie beim Ausweichen nach links zu beachten?
FrageText.en: What must you pay attention to when you move out of the way to the left?
FrageText.hr: Na što morate obratiti pozornost prilikom sklanjanja ulijevo?
FrageText.sl: Na kaj morate biti pozorni, če se umaknete v levo?
FrageText.tr: Sola geçme durumunda neye dikkat etmelisiniz?

de.Text: Ich muss nichts besonderes beachten, weil ich hier Vorrang habe

en.Text: The approaching speed of the streetcar
I must not pay attention to anything in particular because I have the right of way here

hr.Text: Ne moram ni na što osobito paziti jer imam prednost prolaska

sl.Text: Ni mi potrebno biti posebno pozoren, ker imam prednost

tr.Text: Özellikle dikkat etmek zorunda değilim, çünkü burada önceliğim vardır
